articles.title: Americans Are Tipping Less Than They Have in Years - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Frustration with rising menu prices and ubiquitous tip prompts lead to a six-year low
articles.content: People are tipping less at restaurants than they have in at least six years, driven by fatigue over rising prices and growing prompts for tips at places where gratuities havent historically been expe… [+462 chars]

articles.title: From Carter's funeral, an American snapshot: A singular image, 5 presidents, 379 years of history - The Associated Press

articles.content: Look at their faces formal, etched with experience, laden with the weight of momentous decisions. Add up their years: 379 to be exact, enough time to take you back into the mid-1600s, when the notion… [+3736 chars]
